alert.note: Alert for Beartooth Foothills; Livingston Area (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 18 at 2:42AM MST until December 19 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Billings
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Blowing snow, and strong wind gusts 55 to 70 mph. * WHERE...Livingston Area and Beartooth Foothills. * WHEN...Until 5 PM MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility to below a mile at times and produce locally slick road conditions. Strong wind gusts will make travel difficult, especially for high profile vehicles and those towing trailers. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Strongest winds are expected late Saturday night into Sunday morning.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions, call 5 1 1. Additional graphics for this hazard can be found at http://www.weather.gov/billings
